text: :grapes: packages not providing a changelog (especially when there are breaking changes, and how to deal with them when upgrading)

elements.text: packages not providing a changelog (especially when there are breaking changes, and how to deal with them when upgrading)

text:
the tagbot generated list of PRs and issues is not terrible.
As long as PRs are named clearly.

elements.text:
the tagbot generated list of PRs and issues is not terrible.
As long as PRs are named clearly.

text:
But I agree often a proper change log (esp with guidance on how to update) is good to have.

If it is ever one of my packages lacking it, and you feel the need, feel encouraged to open an issue.
